scripts.publish:no-bump: git checkout publish-to-npm && git pull && git merge --no-edit --no-ff main && git push && git checkout main
scripts.publish:patch: git checkout main && bump patch -t "v%s" -p && yarn publish:no-bump
scripts.publish:minor: git checkout main && bump minor -t "v%s" -p && yarn publish:no-bump
scripts.publish:major: git checkout main && bump major -t "v%s" -p && yarn publish:no-bump
scripts.pre:patch: bump prepatch -t "v%s-beta" -p && cross-env npm_config_registry=https://registry.npmjs.org/ npm publish --tag beta
scripts.pre:minor: bump preminor -t "v%s-beta" -p && cross-env npm_config_registry=https://registry.npmjs.org/ npm publish --tag beta
scripts.pre:major: bump premajor -t "v%s-beta" -p && cross-env npm_config_registry=https://registry.npmjs.org/ npm publish --tag beta
